1.title: The Ultimate Scavenger Hunt
1.plot: Hans and Ken compete against each other to win a local scavenger hunt. Phred lies to a cute boy, telling him that she knows how to fly fish just to get a date. And when a boat captain arrives looking for a rope gun, Bryan and Mitch make one from scratch.

2.title: Glacier Girls
2.plot: Phred and Regina's kayak adventure leads to extracting ice from nearby glaciers and just like that the glacier - slushy,or "Glushy" is born. Hans and Ken go on a bachelor party hunting trip while Bryan, Mitch, and Neils compete in a rubberband gun making

3.title: Kindness of Strangers
3.plot: Hans and Ken compete against each other to win a local scavenger hunt. Phred lies to a cute boy and tells him that she knows how to fly fish just to get a date. And when a boat captain comes in looking for a rope gun, Bryan and Mitch construct a gun from

5.title: Pizza Madness
5.plot: Mustache Ken needs help at Uncle Joe's Pizza and convinces Ken and Hans to help out making pizza. Bryan and Phred are tasked with helping Brooke Collins, a woman that punched a bear to save her dog. Niels gives Camo Mark the task of doing inventory.

6.title: Alaska Dreaming
6.plot: Phred is sick of working all the time and so Danny and Regina take her on a fishing trip. Ken has spent 20 years in Alaska and wants to commemorate his milestone . Bryan and Hans take Corey Cogdell ducking hunting before the weather gets bad.

7.title: The New Girl
7.plot: Jim decides to shake things up when he hires a new sales person and Phred isn't happy. Jim sets up a shootout to see who should go to Vegas for a gun show. Niels invites Bryan and Danny to go snow shoeing with him and Ken gets his feelings hurt.

1.title: The Kodiak Experience
1.plot: Hans teaches a young mother how to survive on dangerous, bear infested Kodiak Island. When a colorful character -- Alaska's state "mustache champion" - brings in a load of old guns, Ken and the Wild West crew search for a diamond in the rough.

2.title: The Zombie Salmon
2.plot: Wild West Guns gets fired up for an event like no other - the annual salmon cooking competition and garage sale. An Alaskan cowboy turns to the Wild West crew for help training his shooting horses.

3.title: The Great Alaskan Legend
3.plot: When the winner of a hand-to-paw grizzly battle asks Wild West Guns for a special favor, Ken is faced with a tough choice. After Phred convinces Bryan to help some gold miners with routine gun repairs, they end up going way off the beaten path.

4.title: Bear Problems
4.plot: When Wild West Guns has one of their biggest sales ever, it attracts some of Alaska's quirkiest characters and fiercest bargain hunters. Hans's ex-wife needs help protecting her beloved horse from a monster Grizzly Bear.

5.title: The Salmon Are Running and Hans Needs a Date
5.plot: The Salmon Are Running and Hans Needs A Date

6.title: The First Annual Beard and Mustache Competition
6.plot: When Ken and Phred throw a mustache and beard competition to help promote Wild West Guns, it's truly a hair-raising experience. Jim agrees to build a custom rifle for a river guide, but a dangerous delivery by plane is more than he bargained for.

7.title: Surf and Turf Wedding
7.plot: A bushman comes to Wild West with a tall order - he needs the ultimate survival gun for Alaska's most unforgiving terrain. When Jim and the gang help two sisters throw a huge double wedding, it is definitely Alaskan and definitely one-of-a-kind.

8.title: Fool's Gold Fever
8.plot: Jim helps a father and daughter continue the Alaskan tradition of living off the land. A wily gold prospector lures Ken into a deal that could be a huge windfall - or a total bust.

9.title: The Wild West Gun
9.plot: Jim makes a move that could finally put Wild West Guns in the big leagues of the gun-manufacturing world, but it's a gamble that puts the entire business at risk. Ken, Hans and Phred kick off their search for the next member of the Wild West Guns family.

10.title: Vegas or Bust?
10.plot: The stakes are high as Jim considers closing up shop in Alaska and heading to Las Vegas to put Wild West guns on the map. Ken and Phred meet a homesteader with a piece of military history - a machine gun that was used in Alaska during WWII.

1.title: What About Us?
1.plot: With the future of the Wild West Guns in limbo, the whole gang is desperate for a Plan B. Bryan, Hans and Phred all hit the pavement searching for new jobs. But it's Ken who concocts the craziest plan of all when he tries to make a deal with Neils.

2.title: Special Delivery
2.plot: When Ken makes another off the cuff promise the guys in the shop have to pay the price and deliver a package deep into the bush by air!! And with business booming, Jim hires Phred's friend Larry. But Larry, it turns out, is nothing like anyone expected.

3.title: The Curse
3.plot: When a mirror breaks, Ken is convinced the shop is cursed and goes into karmic overdrive to restore balance. Mitch struggles with Jim's impressive new hire whose yes-sir no-sir attitude have this old hand feeling threatened by the new kid on the block!

4.title: Let the Games Begin
4.plot: Things don't exactly go according to plan when Phred and Larry challenge Hans and Ken to a survival contest deep in the Alaskan bush. And with Jim's wife's Kristy's birthday coming up, he's hard at work on a present she'll never forget.

5.title: Grandma 'Cowboys Up'
5.plot: After Ken hears about an amazing 85-year-old woman who fought off an attacking moose with a shovel, he decides to make her a custom shotgun. And when Phred brings in a stray dog as the new WWG mascot Hans and his dog Jasper both feel snubbed!

6.title: Fishing for Gold
6.plot: Hans tells the guys he got them the day off for some "only in Alaska" salmon fishing. But he's not exactly telling the whole truth! When Alaska's own Olympic shooting champion, Corey Cogdell, comes into town the guys make a wager they can out-shoot her.

7.title: Survival Challenge
7.plot: Things don't exactly go according to plan when Phred and Larry challenge Hans and Ken to a survival contest deep in the Alaskan bush. And with Jim's wife's Kristy's birthday coming up, he's hard at work on a present she'll never forget.

8.title: Hell on Wheels
8.plot: Ken and Hans take the road trip from hell, getting stranded when one of Ken's deals, to make a delivery for pawn shop, gets them into big trouble. Jim's friends from Scotland come into town and he takes them on a real Alaskan fishing adventure.

9.title: An American Hero
9.plot: The guys get very special visit from a real American hero, Medal of Honor winner Dakota Meyer. Bryan decides to show off his culinary skills at the Alaska State Fair in the pie baking contest - but he'll need Phred's expertise.

10.title: Best Friends
10.plot: Ken feels threatened when Hans starts hanging out with the son of an old hunting buddy. Meanwhile, Jim decides to buy a new plane and enlists Mitch's help. But Kristy has other ideas about the best new purchase.

11.title: A Wild West Christmas
11.plot: It's Christmas at Wild West Guns and everyone's getting ready for the holidays Â- and more than that, figuring out how they'll spend their holiday bonuses. But when Ken's deal that paying for it all goes south, he's convinced Christmas is ruined.

1.title: Camo Mark Returns
1.plot: After Ken hires Camo Mark, Hans' arch nemesis, to work at WWG things quickly start to unravel. Hans has gone missing and the rest of the gang ponders his whereabout while blaming Ken for causing the rift. Ken loves Camo Mark but the other aren't sold.

2.title: The Ghost of Hans
2.plot: After quitting Wild West Guns, Ken gets a new job as a tow truck driver, which turns out to be more of a challenge than he thought. Hans is supposedly travelling the world, but Phred has her doubts. Could Hans still be in Anchorage? Phred and Ken team up.

3.title: Midnight Madness
3.plot: After Missing a few payments on his RV, Ken stands to lose his "love palace" on wheels if he doesn't come up with the money fat. He may have a chance to save it if he canpull off a successful "Midnight Madness" sale at the shop.

4.title: Alaska True
4.plot: When a young man brings in a old war gun left from his father the guys at the shop must go to great lengths to figure out what the gun is and how to get it working. Phred challenges the men of the shop to a round of competitions.

5.title: Guys vs. Girls
5.plot: When a young man brings in a old war gun left from his father the guys at the shop must go to great lengths to figure out what the gun is and how to get it working. Phred challenges the men of the shop to a round of competitions.

6.title: Smooth Criminal
6.plot: Hans, Niels take their friend Misha, an unlucky hunter, on an Elk hunt with Russell in hopes of helping Misha bring home meat to his family for the first time. Jim's suspicions get the best of him when his favorite gun has turned up missing.

7.title: The Ultimate Retreat
7.plot: An Alaska sized wilderness sales retreat has Phred Hans Ken and Niels going crazy when a zany camp counselor makes them resolve their problems at work. Bryan and Mitch head out to go fishing but duty calls on the trail when they need to fix people's guns.

8.title: Fathers and Sons
8.plot: Phred and Hans put on a dog adoption day at the shop while Jim, Danny and Russell are away hunting birds. Ken trades a co-pilot for a violin with pawn shop Dan but proves to cause not just noise pollution but Mitch's temper to flare.

-1.title: Pony Express
-1.plot: Phred and Bryan build a survival kit for a woman who is spending the winter out in the bush of Alaska. Hans and Niels both enter the Cabin Tavern Chili cook off. Jim has Ken coordinate a sale to bring in business and Ken plans a western themed sale.

imdb.title: Wild West Alaska
plot: Alaskas finest weapons on sale. Follow Jim & Ken on their adventure selling, buying and using Alaskas weapons.::miron_khalil
